statements: SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, email FROM students WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, phone_number FROM students WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT student_id, email FROM students WHERE student_id > 3 AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT last_name, first_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_phone FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT course_name FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_phone FROM Students WHERE student_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.student_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE course_name LIKE 'Ma%' ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, contact_details FROM students WHERE student_id = 12345;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT name, course_name FROM students, courses WHERE students.id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT students.name, enrollments.enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.id = enrollments.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY name DESC, student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, name FROM students WHERE student_id > 1000
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE credit_hours >= 3 ORDER BY course_name
SELECT name AS student_name, course_name AS enrolled_course FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id
SELECT MAX(credit_hours) AS max_credit_hours FROM courses
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, contact_number FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name FROM enrollments JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, contact_type, contact_info FROM students JOIN contacts ON students.student_id = contacts.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, contact_number FROM students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_name, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE course_id = 2 AND enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, contact_type, contact_info FROM students JOIN contacts ON students.student_id = contacts.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, professor_name FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Students WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT course_name, professor_name, course_description FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade = 'A';

SELECT course_name, enrollment_date, first_name, last_name FROM Courses JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id JOIN Students ON Enrollments.student_id = Students.student_id WHERE enrollment_date > '2021-01-01';
